means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 朱尼珀地貌名称，拉丁语，含义是“桧属植物”(juniper)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 朱尼珀来源于中世纪威尔士语女子名，含义是“白皙的+顺从的+大的”(fair,white+smooth,yielding+large)

word_mean: 杜松实：欧洲杜松(Juniperus communis)或一般杜松树的干燥成熟果实，以前用作利尿剂。果实用作一些酒精饮料的调味品

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin juniperus

entry.tran: 刺柏，桧（其紫色浆果可用于烹饪和制药）
entry.def: A juniper is an evergreen bush with purple berries which can be used in cooking and medicine.

means.word_mean: 1. desert shrub of Syria and Arabia having small white flowers; constitutes the juniper of the Old Testament; sometimes placed in genus Genista
2. coniferous shrub or small tree with berrylike cones
